contentList.content: Gemma Tora
The mighty crystal tiger clan, descendants of a great earthen spirit. Revered as champions of the elements; these fearsome warriors command respect universally.
Sapphire Tora
Inquisitive and ever-learning, the azure tones of these Gemma Tora echo the call for knowledge about all forms of existence.
Jade Tora
The gatekeepers of the afterlife, these noble tiger-kin adorn the dead in lavish jewelry so they may cross into the next life in prosperity.
Ruby Tora
Pure emotion embodied. Fiery commitment personified. These Gemma Tora love with the roaring passion of a crackling inferno, blazing aloud their ideals to those who would hear them.
Topaz Tora
The solar Gemma Tora. The celebration of life and all its idiosyncrasies are critical to the culture of these tigers. They honor their clan as healers and propagators of mortal vitality.
Clan of Combat
Rigorous training with your kin has strengthened you. You are proficient in Light Hammers, Warhammers, and Mauls.
Crystalline Skin
The tiger-kin were rewarded for their commitment to the Earth Mother with crystal coated skin. Your AC is 12 + your Strength and Constitution modifiers.
Battle Cocoon
Become an impregnable fortress. Your skin hardens; you Gain Metal Coating and Blade Ward for 2 turns.
Divine Bite
Sink your radiant fangs into the flesh of your prey.
Breath of Life
Conjure the spirit of your tribe from deep within. Fire a healing wave at your allies, replenishing their vitality.
Preservation
Your commitment to your clan strengthens your resolve. Gain resistance to Radiant damage.
